column4: at least give me the channel name to ask troubleshooting questions about ubuntu...
i am unable to login into graphical mode ...
you have a graphical mode running ?
right now i am using live cd
but using your installed system the graphical system is running but you can't remember the password ?
when ever it goes to runlevel 2
it stops working...i mean it failed to start gdm
what is the problem then. Telling us that you are unable to login in your graphical environment dows not tell os much
when i run "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" it gives the error...
can i do chroot with live cd and then run the dmesg
nope, but you might just be able to see the /var/log/syslog
now do you want that information now...
can you put it into a pastebin or something ?
